body.name: Star Projector, Galaxy Projector Built-in Bluetooth Speaker and 8 White Noise, Night Light Projector for Kids Adults, Aurora Projector for Home Decor/Relaxation/Party/Music/Gift (Black)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Sunday, February 18 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 14 hrs 29 mins
features: 【Upgraded 4 in 1 Galaxy Projector】: ENOKIK star projector can be a galaxy light projector, Bluetooth speaker, white noise machine, and night light. 360° adjustable projection angle increases the projection area by 2/5, and the upgraded LED lights make the projection effect more novel and realistic. The full-featured remote control makes the night light projector easier and more convenient to use.

【White Noise Sound Machine】: The night light for kid room comes pre-loaded with 8 different white noises including: twinkle little stars, summer night, stream, ocean waves, birds chirping, rain, lullaby, and campfire. Use the white noise machine as a soothing tool to help you relax and eliminate insomnia.

【Amazing Lighting Effects】: This decor projector has 4 light speeds, 4 brightness levels. By adjusting the red, green, blue and white colors and star points, you will have 16 freely matching aurora effects. We can immerse ourselves in the atmosphere with led projector lights for room to create aurora effects and magic for ourselves.

【Timable Projector】: The star projector for bedroom also has a built-in auto-off timer that you can set it to turn off after 1 or 2 hours. If you forget to set the timer, it will automatically turn off after 4 hours, making your use more time-saving. If you want to continue using aurora borealis light, you can turn it on again.

【Perfect Gift】: This aurora projector is ideal for family gatherings/photo shoots/birthday parties/karaoke nights/wedding events. If you have any problem with the product, please don't hesitate to contact us, we will try our best to give you a satisfactory solution, how to contact us? Login to your Amazon account > select "Your Orders" > find the order ID > click "Contact Seller".

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Incredible Little Light!
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I bought this light for its visual effects, so that is the main focus of my review. I wanted something to make my hospital room feel a little more relaxing while I’m in labor. This light will definitely do the job! I have been enjoying playing around with the different effects (you can toggle the 4 colors on/off to create your own color combos) and modes (how the lights switch between colors, if you want them to be dynamic). You can turn the brightness up and down as well as adjust the speed of the movements. The stars and the aurora can also be turned off individually- there are so many different ways to enjoy this product. The depth of the stars/aurora is crazy as well; I really could stare at the visuals for hours. All of these are features I didn’t even realize this thing had when I decided to buy it. There are also several different preprogrammed sounds and a Bluetooth speaker that works great for the price. 5 star product in my book, definitely worth every penny!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this for my autistic son for help with his anxiety. I like the ability to change the combination of colors, red, green, blue, white into any combination you like. The laser stars fade in and out at a slow rate, which is nice, or you can turn them off. The movement of the swirl design is normal speed or no speed. I wish there was a slower speed to the swirl. The added sound features of thunder, water stream, ocean, morning birds and the ability to control the sound level is helpful as my son is hearing impaired. The control has the feature to auto shut off after a period of time, which we haven't tried yet. Instructions say don't operate more than 4 hours at a time. Best investment of my funds for this product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great night light
reviews.reviewText: This light is super cute and I love the relaxing sound effects it has. Easy to set up and perfect for my daughter’s room. I recommend this light. Great for home office or any personal space. Very relaxing.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: okay a few things.1. the green dots are bright. turn these off unless its totally pointed at the ceiling.2. if you have other lightbulbs that change colors and also work on an rf remote, this remote will catch those and change those lights as well. you gotta get close to this one but this is no issue.3. power is low-volt, i use my alarm clock to power it.4. the little cart is so stinkin cute and fits on my bed frame. its like a little mine cart :35. you can mix the colors. theres not THAT many options for colors but hey, you can mix em and get more and change brightness.6. the bluetooth is a joke. it is absolutely hilarious. theres also a built in, I guess, white noise generator (or nature generator). it sounds terrible, I love it. I put it on when im not putting on sims build videos in the background while running my credit card on gatcha gambling machines online.it werks. its gud. get it on sale.

reviews.reviewerName: Mommy on a Mission!Mommy on a Mission!
reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I bought this for my daughter for Christmas because she loves anything to do with space. I took this picture just to check and make sure the projector worked before I gave it to her on Christmas. It was during the day and she has three large windows in her bedroom. Though the light was off, you can still see that even with natural light flooded in the room the still light came through pretty clearly on her ceiling. That was truly impressive. It’s even more gorgeous at night. The only reason I’m knocked a star off is because the sound feature didn’t work. However, my daughter said it’s not something she would use anyway cause it would drive her nuts so we didn’t bother to exchange it. We are fine just using it as is. I would definitely buy it again though it’s probably one of the better ones I’ve seen. There’s a lot of different settings . The one shown in the picture actually has motion and swirls around. Some are still, some are moving, colors vary and some have stars all around it. Overall I’m extremely happy with my purchase . Best of all it shuts off after a couple hours . It has a remote so if she hasn’t fallen asleep by then she can turn it back on without getting out of bed . Perfect

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 22, 2023
reviews.reviewText: My son was very pleased!! He has several beautiful images!! Every night, turn on and relax to sleep!! It has an excellent projection, easy to use and connects to his phone and projects very good images!! Easy to use and now he sleeps more peacefully in his room alone!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect Night Light for the Grandkids.
reviews.reviewText: Gave this as a Christmas gift to my Grand daughter. She loves it. The remote works well Casts just the right amount of light in the room and the variations in color were easy to manipulate. Hope it holds up over time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Bought this for my daughter for Christmas cause she really wanted it. At first it was nice but It didn't even last a whole week . It stopped working . She so disappoint and a waste of money for me..Update.. customer service did get in touch with me . She was really nice and offered a refund but I wanted a replacement instead . I gave 3 stars because of the customer service got with me fast and she was really nice.Update... Had a replacement sent and it worked . But if you do buy one and it don't work customer service is really good I had no issues in getting a refund but I did not want a refund I wanted a replacement and had no issues there... So I changed and gave a 5 star review...

Loved this purchase! Like this way more than LED lights. Speaker sounded better than I expected. Though, I did think this came with built in whitenoise options on top of the bluetooth for some reason (??) I still am very happy with the features of this product and I have found it helps me fall asleep way quicker!! Only issue I have with it is that the remote only works when you are basically standing right in front of it but it still is a very nice product and super easy to find somewhere to set
Buena calidad de imagen, trae bocina y aparte sonido de pájaros para relajación

reviews.reviewTitle: Very nice! My kids love it

reviews.reviewText: Bought as a gift from one sibbling to another. Appreciated and enjoyed the lights.

The colours and Bluetooth functions are great, but it only works when the USB cable is connected to electric outlet. I was hoping it would be able to charge and be used anywhere. Unfortunately it always needs to be near an outlet. The remote works well.
